description: A guideline available in the catalog

@context.description: The EJPRD context (i.e, JSON-LD context) containing the semantic definition of the properties in this schema

@id.description: Unique identifier of the guideline. It has the same meaning as @id in JSON-LD

@type.description: The type of resource. It must be ejprd:Guideline (required)

logo.description: A link to a graphic representation of the guidline (optional)

theme.description: A list of concepts that this resource deals with. It has to be an IRI represented as CURIE. (required)

license.description: This should contain a URL that provides details regarding the license that is applicable to this resource (required)

personalData.description: Whether the resource handles personal data or not

conformsTo.description: If applicable, it should point to the IRI an established standard to which the described resource conforms (recommended)

vpConnection.description: Tells the EJP RD Virtual Platform whether content of this resource is discoverable or whether the resource is discoverable (required)

items.description: One or more web pages that can be navigated to in a Web browser to gain access to the resource (optional)

language.description: A list of ISO 639-1 two-letter codes for the languages this resource is provided (required)

accessRights.description: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status. This should point to a URL where this information can be found (recommended)

hasPolicy.description: An ODRL conformant policy expressing the rights associated with the resource (recommended)
